meanings.def: a list, especially an official or published list of people or things, often arranged in alphabetical order
examples: a comprehensive listing of all airlines
Refer to the listings in the latest Yellow Pages.
The service started with an original listing of 53 local businesses.

meanings.def: information online or in a newspaper or magazine about what films, plays, etc. are being shown in a particular town or city
a position or an item on a list
examples: (business) The company is seeking a stock exchange listing (= for trading shares).
